Package at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.visualization.heightfield

Provides classes creating 3-dimensional visualisations of trained SOMs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TerrainHeightGenerator Interface for classes generating terrain topologies from SOMs.
 

Class Summary
SmoothedDataHistogramGenerator Extends the SmoothedDataHistograms to provide a TerrainHeightGenerator for 3D visualisations.
UMatrixGenerator Extends the UMatrix to provide a TerrainHeightGenerator for 3D visualisations.
 

Package at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.visualization.heightfield Description

Provides classes creating 3-dimensional visualisations of trained SOMs. New visualisations need to iplement the TerrainHeightGenerator interface and register themselves in the SOMViewer3D.postInit() method.
TerrainHeightGenerators actually only provide a Heightfield, the visualisation of which is done in the 3D viewing application.
